scripts.build: uglifyjs node_modules/keymaster/keymaster.js js/utils.js js/drop_down.js js/info.js js/revisions_main_thread.js js/find_replace.js js/keyboard.js js/app.js -o all.build.js --source-map all.build.map.js --source-map-include-sources --screw-ie8v && html-minifier html/app.html -o app.build.html --minify-js --collapse-whitespace --conservative-collapse
